name: e-multimedia
description:
We were born willing to see further and earlier than others. More than a decade ago, we became the first to make 2D and 3D animations for the commercial, industrial and government sectors in the shoal zone. We incorporated video post-production services, web development and multimedia services in 1998.
The needs of the environment and the intuition to do business, in 2001, e-multimedia became a pioneer in the production of virtual tours under new schemes for construction companies and architects.
